title: Installation issue: catalyst
body:
catalyst do_stage function call failed with python and python3 false as default.
some catalyst dependent packages depend on python3 and the PYTHONHOME is set to the home of the python installed by spack, so that the system python will not work.

I add the follow codes in do_stage function and it works.
        if '+python3' not in self.spec and '+python' not in self.spec:
            os.unsetenv('PYTHONHOME')

Thank you!

### Steps to reproduce the issue
$ spack install --keep-stage -v catalyst
